subject: VAM Pro for pro plus?
description_text:
Dear Simsonn

I recently ordered the pro plus pedals and are very happy with them. I now saw the VAM haptics. If I buy a set do I get a EU power supply because in the pictures it is the american version?
Also wich control box do I need for the pro plus pedals and how long is shipping to the Netherlands?
I would also like to know how long the warrenty is.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards

Martijn Slingerland

conversations.body_text: Hi Martijn Slingerland,    For the Pro Plus pedals, you only need to purchase the PlusX control box to support the VAM Pro. We offer four types of power adapters: UK, EU, US, and AU standards. Please note “EU plug” in your order, and we will include the appropriate adapter. We will get back to you shortly regarding the shipping time to the Netherlands!

Hi

Any update on the delivery time for the vam pro sets?


________________________________
你好，Martijn Slingerland，  我们有足够的库存，订单通常在工作日 24 小时内发货。
